赻字的基本解释

赻
xiǎn
古同“鲜”，少。
走不及。

赻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiǎn］
［《篇海類編》蘇典切］
(1)同“鲜”。稀少，罕见。
(2)走不及。

赻字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【走字部】　赻； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1215第27
【韻會】鮮，說文本作尟。亦作赻。【古文易】赻不及矣。【正字通】尟字之譌。《說文》尟从是从少，不从走。

赻字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
赻字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiǎn］
["Pianhai Leibian" Su Dianqie]
(1) Same as "fresh". Rare, rare.
(2) Lack of time.
赻
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Department of Walking Characters] 　赻; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 1215 Page 27
[Rhyme Club] Fresh, saying that the text is fresh. Also used as 赻. [Easy of ancient texts] It's not enough. 【Zhengzitong】The fresh character of Jiao. "Suo Wen" rarely follows from being young, not from leaving.
